title: Side Stand - Removal

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Wear hand, eye and face protection when unhooking the stand spring. Take great care to minimise the risk of personal injury and loss of components.
Note the orientation of the side stand spring so that it can be fitted in its correct orientation upon installation.
With the side stand in the up position, unhook the spring from the side stand and remove it from the motorcycle.

body.name: Side Stand Spring and Fixing, L0252

body.body: Do not allow the side stand to hang unsupported on the side stand switch harness.
Unscrew and remove the two fixings and remove the side stand bracket from the frame.
With the aid of an assistant, support the side stand assembly then release and discard the side stand switch fixings.
Unscrew and discard the lock nut from the side stand pivot bolt.
Unscrew the pivot bolt and remove the stand from the motorcycle.
